lihalite commented on pull request #4928: ARROW-6017: [FlightRPC] Enable creating Flight Locations for unknown schemes
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/4928
 
 
   The motivation is to enable interop with future Flight versions that may support different transports, and to enable a Flight service to reference a non-Flight service.
   
   Personal Travis: https://travis-ci.com/lihalite/arrow/builds/120257110
   AppVeyor: https://ci.appveyor.com/project/lihalite/arrow/builds/26189055

issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

fields.description: Right now Flight clients error if the server hands them a Location with an unknown scheme. Also, you can't construct locations with non-gRPC schemes. Since Flight will want to support other transports, we should allow unknown schemes up until a client is constructed for them. This would also make it possible for a Flight service to reference non-Flight services in FlightInfo.
fields.summary: [FlightRPC] Allow creating Locations with unknown schemes
